snippet.title: Exoblast - Trailer 1.0 (ft. PADG)
snippet.description:
Exoblast is a mix of shoot’em up and arcade game, pimped with synthwave and pixelart. Choose your ship, your pilot and join the arena to confront other players in nervous and punitive matches. Impose your gameplay and reach the top of the tower!

Voice Actor : PADG
Music : Walkman - LukHash

Play now for free: https://store.steampowered.com/app/725100/Exoblast/?l=english

Join our socials!
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exoblastgame/
twitter: https://twitter.com/exoblastgame
Discord: https://discord.gg/2mMTMRxaCb

See you in the arena, Pilot!
